_description: ‘O lumen indeficiens o claritas se[e]mpiterna,’ a prayer to God for the light of knowledge to free men from the darkness of ignorance — 40 lines

BosHistSoc.First Lines:
O eternall & personis threeO father celestiall maker of all
                    thynges…
BosHistSoc.Last Lines:
…Onely of hys goodnes & mercy InfinyteTo laude &
                    prayse hym as yt ys Ryght
BosHistSoc.Attributed Title:
O lumen indeficiens O claritas Se[m]piterna (f.
                    154ra)
